subdisciplines.name: Systems Neuroscience
subdisciplines.description: The study of the function of neural circuits and systems that give rise to specific behaviors.

subdisciplines.name: Cognitive Neuroscience
subdisciplines.description: The study of the neural mechanisms that underlie cognitive processes, such as perception, attention, language, memory, and decision-making.

subdisciplines.name: Computational Cognitive Neuroscience
subdisciplines.description: The use of computational models to explain cognitive processes in the brain.
